content: > it s fun to crochet this classic with new yarns and an array of colors follow our list of colors or get creative with your own colors it s a great way to whittle down your stash 1 ball each no 4601 off white ca cc no 3720 lavender cf no 4422 tangerine cg no 2515 turquoise chain no 4412 grass green ci no 3729 grape cj and 2 balls each no 1882 gauge 9 rnds = 10½ across in pattern german version can be found here 1 1 https //web archive org/web/20151010194549/http //www redheart de/files/patterns/pdf/lw4901de pdf
